evidence.text: ORDER. For the reasons set forth in the court's 47 Memorandum Opinion, Plaintiffs' 3 Motion for Preliminary Injunction is denied and Defendants' 27 Motion to Dismiss is granted. Plaintiffs' 2 Motion to Certify Class is denied as moot. Signed by Judge Amit P. Mehta on 7/7/2025.

extracted.value: 2025-07-07: Order denying preliminary injunction and granting dismissal

evidence.text: ORDER granting in part and denying in part Plaintiffs' 51 Emergency Motion for Injunction Pending Appeal. The parties shall file a Joint Status Report by September 29, 2025, which updates the court on the status of appellate proceedings... Signed by Judge Amit P. Mehta on 7/21/2025.

extracted.value: 2025-07-21: Order granting in part and denying in part Emergency Motion for Injunction Pending Appeal
